content.eamr: ( ing-0 "3 cups crushed vanilla wafers" )
( ing-1 "1/2 cup chopped pecans" )
( ing-2 "2/3 cup butter, melted" )
( ing-3 "2 cups semisweet chocolate chips" )
( ing-4 "4 cups milk" )
( ing-5 "4 1/2 cups miniature marshmallows" )

content.text: 2 (3.5 ounce) packages instant vanilla pudding mix
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "2 (3.5 ounce) packages instant vanilla pudding mix" )
( ing-7 "1 cup frozen whipped topping, thawed" )
( ing-8 "2 large bananas, sliced" )
( ing-9 "1 (1.5 ounce) bar milk chocolate candy" )

content.text: 0) Combine crushed cookie crumbs, pecans, and butter or margarine.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
   :inform ( "Combine"@3:10 / AC
      :ppt ( "crushed cookie crumbs"@11:32 / FOOD )
      :ppt ( "pecans"@34:40 / FOOD )
      :ppt ( "butter"@46:52 / FOOD )
      :ppt ( "margarine"@56:65 / FOOD )
   )
)

content.text: 1) Press into a 9 x 13 inch pan.
2) Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 5 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
   :inform ( "Bake"@3:7 / AC
      :heat ( "375 degrees F"@11:24 / TEMPERATURE )
      :heat ( "190 degrees C"@26:39 / TEMPERATURE )
      :duration ( "5 minutes"@45:54 / DUR )
      :ppt( NULL / FOOD )
   )
)

content.text: 4) Combine chocolate chips, 1 cup milk, and 2 cups marshmallows in a sauce pan.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "chocolate chips"@11:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "1 cup milk"@28:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "2 cups marshmallows"@44:63 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-4-0 "a sauce pan"@67:78 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Stir over low heat until melted.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Stir"@3:7 / AC
		:heat ( temp-5-0 "low heat"@13:21 / TEMPERATURE )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until melted"@22:34 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Arrange banana slices over chilled chocolate layer.
9) Prepare pudding mix as directed on box except use only 3 cups of milk.
10) Fold in nondairy whipped topping and remaining marshmallows.
12) Grate chocolate bar over the top.
13) Chill for 2 to 3 hours before serving.
content.eamr:
( inst-13 / R
	:inform ( ac-13-0 "Chill"@4:9 / AC
		:duration ( dur-13-0 "2 to 3 hours"@14:26 / DUR )
		:duration ( cond-13-0 "before serving"@27:41 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
